title: Paper Watch Free
summary: Android Wear watch face that shows the time and watch battery level.
description: Introducing the Paper Watch Free, a simple yet beautiful and functional watch face.The watch face looks like a pencil on paper sketch.Features:-- current time and- watch battery level.Designed for square, round and Moto 360 Android Wear watches.In ambient mode, the hour and minute hands are shown.The watch battery level scale reflects color based on the corresponding levels from green to red.If you like it, please rate and check out the enhanced version also.Please email us if you face any issues and do check out our other designs as well.
descriptionHTML:
Introducing the Paper Watch Free, a simple yet beautiful and functional watch face.

The watch face looks like a pencil on paper sketch.


Features:-
- current time and
- watch battery level.


Designed for square, round and Moto 360 Android Wear watches.
In ambient mode, the hour and minute hands are shown.


The watch battery level scale reflects color based on the corresponding levels from green to red.

If you like it, please rate and check out the enhanced version also.


Please email us if you face any issues and do check out our other designs as well.
comments: Clever! This is such a clever idea! Definitely one of the more creative watch faces I've seen. Very clean, charming design. And the battery indicator is a nice touch. Obviously a lot of work put into this by the developers.
recentChanges: Support for Huawei and newer watches.
